#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int* win=new int[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>win[i];
		int mx=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			int temp;
			cin>>temp;
			int score=3*win[i]+temp;
			mx=(score>mx)?score:mx;
		}
		cout<<mx<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
